body_html:
Using this patch works:

https://github.com/keras-team/keras/pull/9700/files

I think many machines are still equipped with CUDA 8.0, so the GPU driver limits prebuilt tensorflow version <= 1.4.1.
In order words, keras > 2.1.6 force to use CUDA 9.0 indirectly since it only supports TF >= 1.5.0.

In order words, keras > 2.1.6 force to use CUDA 9.0 indirectly since it only supports TF >= 1.5.0.
body:
Using this patch works:

https://github.com/keras-team/keras/pull/9700/files

I think many machines are still equipped with CUDA 8.0, so the GPU driver limits prebuilt tensorflow version <= 1.4.1.
In order words, keras > 2.1.6 force to use CUDA 9.0 indirectly since it only supports TF >= 1.5.0.
